tika-abh03t0:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desento bhagavā yasmiṁ samaye desesi, taṁ samayaṁ dassetuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:5_1: vibhaṅgānantaraṁ desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṁ dassetuṁ vā ‘‘aṭṭhārasahī’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:5_5: maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṁ niratisayaṁ taṁ bhañjanaṁ upādāya bhagavā eva ‘‘mārabhañjano’’ti thomito. Tattha māre abhañjesi, mārabhañjanaṁ vā etassa,
tika-abh03t0:6_1: abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vāti katvā tesaṁ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_2: Yadipi aññesu ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā,
tika-abh03t0:6_3: ettha pana tesaṁ sabbesaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu nayesu ekekasmiṁ kathitattā sātisayaṁ kathananti idameva evaṁnāmakaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_5: Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṁ assa nāmaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_6: Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṁ pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti.
tika-abh03t0:6_9: ‘‘Yaṁ dhātukatha’’nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṁ pakaraṇānaṁ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti tena yojanaṁ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṁ tassatthanti a-kāralopo vā. Tanti taṁ dīpanaṁ suṇātha,
tika-abh03t0:6_10: taṁ vā atthaṁ taṁdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:10_1: Ko panetassa pakaraṇassa paricchedoti? Na so idha vattabbo, aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ (dha. sa. aṭṭha.
tika-abh03t0:10_2: nidānakathā) pakaraṇaparicchedo vutto evāti dassento āha ‘‘cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta’’nti.
tika-abh03t0:10_4: khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā, nayānaṁ mātikā uddeso,
tika-abh03t0:10_6: Etesaṁ padānaṁ mūlabhūtattāti ‘‘mūlamātikā’’ti vattabbānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṁ cuddasannaṁ padānaṁ khandhādidhammavibhajanassa imassa pakaraṇassa mūlabhūtattā nissayabhūtattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:12_2: paṭiccasamuppādavacanena ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṁ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati,
tika-abh03t0:12_3: tadatthāni dvādasa padāni dassitānīti tesaṁ tathādassitānaṁ sarūpeneva dassitānaṁ phassādīnañca padānaṁ vasena āha ‘‘pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā’’ti.
tika-abh03t0:12_4: Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṁ idha vibhattānaṁ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṁ jarāmaraṇassa viya aniṭṭhattā tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:12_5: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṁ bhinditvā gahaṇaṁ karonto tesaṁ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:13_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā nāma,
tika-abh03t0:13_1: tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṁ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṁ pakāsento ‘‘ayañhī’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:13_2: Tattha evaṁ avatvāti yathā ‘‘sabbāpi…pe… mātikā’’ti ayaṁ dhātukathāmātikato bahiddhā vuttā, evaṁ avatvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:13_3: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:13_4: Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā .
tika-abh03t0:13_5: Atha vā evaṁ avatvāti yathā ‘‘sabbāpi…pe… mātikā’’ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā, evaṁ avatvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:13_6: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:13_7: Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā vikiṇṇabhāvena pakiṇṇakatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:15_1: Nayānaṁ pavattidvārabhūtā saṅgahāsaṅgahaviyogīsahayogīdhammā nayamukhānīti tesaṁ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh03t0:15_2: Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṁ vomissakatāvasena pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti,
tika-abh03t0:15_3: te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṁ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:15_4: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi vutto,
tika-abh03t0:15_5: so pana saṅgāhakabhūtehi tehi vutto, na saṅgahabhūtehi,
tika-abh03t0:15_6: sopi ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre tatthāpi khandhādīheva saṅgahehi niyametvā vutto, tasmā ‘‘tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:15_7: Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ sampayogavippayogā catūheva khandhehi hontīti ‘‘catūhi sampayogo,catūhi vippayogo’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:16_3: Na hi rūpaṁ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṁ hoti, nibbānaṁ vā rūpena,
tika-abh03t0:16_4: catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ rūpanibbānehi vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:16_8: sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena missakena ca hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:18_1: Visabhāgoti etassa ‘‘tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho’’ti etena, ‘‘catūhi sampayogo,
tika-abh03t0:18_2: catūhi vippayogo’’ti etenapi visuṁ yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh03t0:18_3: Tena saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo,
tika-abh03t0:18_4: tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-abh03t0:18_5: Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca,
tika-abh03t0:18_7: tathā yassa sampayogo vippayogo ca, sopi sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:18_8: Tattha yena rūpakkhandho…pe… manoviññāṇadhātūti dhammā gaṇanaṁ gacchanti,
tika-abh03t0:20_0: 5.Evaṁ dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattāti ‘‘sabbāpi…pe… mātikā’’ti etena ṭhapanākārena bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:20_1: Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya imassa pakaraṇassa mātikābhāvena ṭhapitattā tathā pakāsitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:21_2: Saṅgahoti atthaṁ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā.
tika-abh03t0:21_3: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh03t0:21_4: Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṁ patto ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’’tiādīsu ‘‘saṅgaho’’ti vuttoti na koci doso.
tika-abh03t0:21_5: Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā, na tato pubbeti.
tika-abh03t0:21_6: Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā ‘‘jātiyā saṅgaho’’ti vutte ‘‘attano jātiyā’’ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa avuttattāti jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t0:22_1: sampayogo vippayogo’’ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṁ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā, avasesā niddhāretvā.
tika-abh03t0:22_2: ‘‘Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’nti hi ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahita’’nti vattabbe ekassa asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:22_6: Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu chaṭṭhavajjesu.
tika-abh03t0:22_7: Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ katvā tattha tattha antimapadasadisena tatiyapadena pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:22_11: Tattha hi sabhāvantarena sabhāvantarassa visesanaṁ kataṁ,
tika-abh03t0:22_13: Ekādasamādīsu pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t0:22_15: Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṁ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t0:23_2: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t0:23_4: Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttānaṁ cittuppādānaṁ sādhāraṇavasena vutto, itare sabbesanti.
tika-abh03t0:23_5: Tattha sādhāraṇā pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā,
tika-abh03t0:23_7: asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṁ dassetuṁ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho.
tika-abh03t0:23_8: ‘‘Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā’’ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṁ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṁ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Sanniṭṭhānavasena ye vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:23_9: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho,
tika-abh03t0:23_10: tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti katvā vutto aññassa tādisassa abhāvāti ayamadhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:24_0: Jīvitindriyaṁ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:24_1: cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṁ aññaṁ byāpetabbaṁ nivattetabbañca natthīti anaññabyāpakanivattakasāmaññavisesadīpanato tasseva dhammassa bhedadīpakehi vattabbā,
tika-abh03t0:24_2: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva,
tika-abh03t0:24_3: tasmā ‘‘cittekaggatā’’ti ayaṁ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya,
tika-abh03t0:24_4: itaro ca samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha uddesaṁ na arahati.
tika-abh03t0:24_5: Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṁ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_2: tesaṁ pana sabhāvato abhiññātānaṁ dhammānaṁ pariññeyyatādivisesadassanatthaṁ saccāni,
tika-abh03t0:29_3: adhipatiyādikiccavisesadassanatthaṁ indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso ca abhiññeyyanissito vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti ‘‘tīhi saṅgaho.
tika-abh03t0:29_5: Evañca katvā ‘‘catūhī’’ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_6: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā ‘‘rūpakkhandho’’ti vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:29_7: tesaṁ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t0:29_8: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṁ gaṇanaṁ dasseti. Tenāha ‘‘yañhi kiñcī’’tiādi.
tika-abh03t0:29_9: Rūpakkhandhoti hi saṅgahitabbadhammo dassito. Yena saṅgahena saṅgayhati,
tika-abh03t0:29_11: Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh03t0:30_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṁ ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’’ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:30_2: Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne viseso natthīti pacchimeheva yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko,
tika-abh03t0:30_4: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:30_5: Tesaṁ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṁ pucchāvissajjanaṁ kātabbaṁ saṁkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:30_6: vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti pāḷiṁ na āropitanti.
tika-abh03t0:32_1: ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṁ cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṁ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṁ diṭṭhaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:32_2: Na hettha cakkhusotacakkhusukhindriyadukānaṁ aññamaññasadisavissajjanaṁ, nāpi dukehi tikassa,
tika-abh03t0:32_3: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṁ aññamaññaṁ tikena ca sadisaṁ vissajjananti dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṁ samudayānantaraṁ maggasaccassa vacane kāraṇaṁ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:34_2: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā’’ti likhitabbepi pamādavasena ‘‘avijjā ekena khandhenā’’ti idaṁ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:34_3: Sarūpekasesaṁ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṁ dassitanti.
tika-abh03t0:34_4: Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṁ na kātabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:34_5: Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṁ dhātukathāyaṁ saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇādipadehi saṅgahitatā vippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese ‘‘vipākā dhammā’’ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṁ vissajjanena dassitā,
tika-abh03t0:34_6: idha ca nāmarūpassa ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgahavacanena akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t0:35_1: Jāyamānaparipaccamānabhijjamānānaṁ jāyamānādibhāvamattattā jātijarāmaraṇāni paramatthato vinibbhujjitvā anupalabbhamānāni paramatthānaṁ sabhāvamattabhūtāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_2: tāni rūpassa nibbattipākabhedabhūtāni ruppanabhāvena gayhantīti rūpakkhandhadhammasabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_3: arūpānaṁ pana nibbattiādibhūtāni rūpakalāpajātiādīni viya sahuppajjamānacatukkhandhakalāpanibbattiādibhāvato ekekabhūtāni vediyanasañjānanavijānanehi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇena anekantaparamatthakiccena gayhantīti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammasabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_4: tathā duvidhānipi tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi sabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_5: tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti ‘‘jāti dvīhi khandhehī’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:38_1: Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṁ taṁ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṁ asaṅgahitaṁ dhammajātaṁ niddhāritaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_2: tadeva tāva dassento ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:38_3: Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṁ niccaṁ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā ca pucchāvissajjanānaṁ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā.
tika-abh03t0:38_4: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:38_5: teyeva dhammā ‘‘khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_6: tesaṁ pana evaṁvidhānaṁ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā uddesepi yaṁ yaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_7: taṁ taṁ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṁ niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṁ dhammaṁ niyametvā dassetuṁ ‘‘cakkhāyatanenā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:38_10: itaresu ca yaṁ yaṁ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṁ niddhāritaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_11: tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo araṇantā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:39_2: Ettha ca yena yena saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṁ aññaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:39_4: Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo añño dhammo natthi, tathā vedanākkhandhādīhi ,
tika-abh03t0:39_5: na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako vā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:39_7: tañca na tasseva tena saṅgahitataṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:39_8: rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena vā gahitataṁ sandhāya vuttanti pakāsitoyamattho.
tika-abh03t0:40_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya,
tika-abh03t0:40_1: saṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadaniddese – ‘‘vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:40_2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā’’tiādi vattabbaṁ siyā, na ca vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:40_3: tasmā yathā cittaṁ cittena sampayuttaṁ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_4: evaṁ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_6: Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:40_13: yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca tesaṁ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti,
tika-abh03t0:40_14: tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṁ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca.
tika-abh03t0:40_15: Yathā dhammāyatanaṁ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca rūpakkhandhekadesassa khandhasaṅgahena,
tika-abh03t0:40_16: jīvitindriyaṁ rūpārūpajīvitasabhāgavisabhāgassa rūpakkhandhekadesassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassa ca jīvitavajjassa khandhasaṅgaheneva.
tika-abh03t0:40_19: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte saṅgāhakattameva etesaṁ natthi,
tika-abh03t0:40_20: yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:41_0: Yaṁ pana ‘‘dhammāyatanaṁ asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita’’nti (dhātu. 25),
tika-abh03t0:41_1: ‘‘cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita’’nti (dhātu. 26) ca vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:41_4: catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṁ,
tika-abh03t0:41_6: Saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhānaṁ gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṁ taṁtaṁgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:41_7: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṁ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā .
tika-abh03t0:41_8: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṁtaṁkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatā ,
tika-abh03t0:41_9: dutiyādīsu yathāniddhāritadhammadassane saṅgāhakasaṅgahetabbānaṁ samānakkhandhādibhāvo sabhāgatā, tadabhāvo ca visabhāgatā.
tika-abh03t0:42_1: na saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni.
tika-abh03t0:42_2: Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:42_4: Evaṁ saṅgāhakattābhāvato asaṅgāhakattābhāvato ubhayābhāvato ca yathāvuttasadisāni anuddharitvā saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattabhāvato cakkhāyatanādīneva uddhaṭānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh03t0:42_5: Tattha ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’ti cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā, na rūpakkhandhoti.
tika-abh03t0:43_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana khandhapadenāti khandhapadasaṅgahenāti attho, na saṅgāhakenāti.
tika-abh03t0:43_2: Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti taṁ vissajjanaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:43_3: Rūpakkhandhena hi…pe… saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito,
tika-abh03t0:43_4: so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṁ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti āpajjatīti ce? Nāpajjati.
tika-abh03t0:43_7: So cātiādi ca na nirapekkhavacanaṁ, atha kho saṅgāhakāpekkhanti. Kathaṁ?
tika-abh03t0:43_8: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_10: na evaṁ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṁ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_12: rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t0:43_13: Siyā panetaṁ ‘‘so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū’’ti,
tika-abh03t0:43_14: taṁ nivārento āha ‘‘so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī’’ti .
tika-abh03t0:43_16: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṁ vā cakkhādīnaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:43_17: na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṁ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitatāya. Na hi sā saṅgahitatā atthi. Yadi siyā,
tika-abh03t0:43_19: Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso vā saṅgahitā siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:44_1: aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:45_0: Tattha yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito’’ti,
tika-abh03t0:45_3: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṁ samudayasaccādīsu yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:45_6: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe kāraṇanti yuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:45_7: Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṁ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi,
tika-abh03t0:45_8: aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ bhavituṁ yuttoti.
tika-abh03t0:45_9: Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṁ saṅgahitānaṁ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko,
tika-abh03t0:46_0: Anidassanaṁ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena ‘‘sanidassanasappaṭigha’’nti ettha vuttena sappaṭighasaddena saddhiṁ yojetvā anidassanasappaṭighā dassitā.
tika-abh03t0:46_1: Punadevāti etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṁ sanidassanapadaṁ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṁ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:46_2: ‘‘Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahita’’nti idaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:46_3: Na hi ‘‘cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṁ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita’’nti ca ‘‘asaṅgahita’’nti ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṁ nayoti.
tika-abh03t0:46_4: Evaṁ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:46_5: Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti, na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti.
tika-abh03t0:49_1: Asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesu vedanādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ khandhānaṁ nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusabhāgattaṁ natthi,
tika-abh03t0:49_2: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni. Na kevalaṁ saṅgahitāneva,
tika-abh03t0:49_3: asaṅgahitānipi tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t0:49_5: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā.
tika-abh03t0:49_6: Dukkhasaccādīhi ca pañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtehi khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitaṁ nibbānaṁ rūpakkhandhena viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ tehi na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:49_7: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṁ asaṅgāhakabhāvena aggahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:49_8: sanibbānapañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtānaṁ pana abyākatadhammādīnaṁ asaṅgāhakattābhāvatova. Na hi taṁ kañci atthi,
tika-abh03t0:49_10: na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ katanti.
tika-abh03t0:50_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā’’ti, taṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:50_1: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā ,
tika-abh03t0:50_2: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṁ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti dassitoyaṁ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:50_3: Yāni…pe… gahitānīti etena viññāṇasammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:50_6: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṁ aññāyatanena asammissaṁ dīpentāni gahitānīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:53_1: Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṁ saṅgahānaṁ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇappavattivisesena ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:53_2: asaṅgahitena saṅgahita’’nti ca uddiṭṭhā, nevaṁ catutthapañcamā.
tika-abh03t0:53_3: Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:53_5: tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha kenaci saṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca,
tika-abh03t0:53_6: tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṁ dassento ‘‘samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandha…pe… saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:53_7: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… saṅgahitā’’ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:53_8: Ettha ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_9: ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_10: ye ca ekena khandhasaṅgaheneva dhātusaṅgaheneva ca na saṅgāhakā vedanādikkhandhanirodhasaccajīvitindriyādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca,
tika-abh03t0:53_11: te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh03t0:53_14: Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti,
tika-abh03t0:53_15: yassa puna saṅgaho pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:54_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:54_1: Yaṁ panetaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyyā’’ti,
tika-abh03t0:54_2: taṁ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṁ ayojetvā taṁ aññaṁ saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthīti evaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ. Na hi yena yaṁ saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:54_3: teneva tassa saṅgaho pucchito vissajjito, na ca tasseva, atha kho tena saṅgahitassāti.
tika-abh03t0:54_4: Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañca, na evaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:54_8: Yampi cetaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, te dhamme sandhāyā’’ti, tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:54_9: Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha pucchito vissajjito ca, atha kho saṅgahova,
tika-abh03t0:54_10: tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti ayamevettha attho, na saṅgāhakenāti.
tika-abh03t0:54_11: Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t0:57_2: Ettha ca sasukhumarūpaviññāṇasahitadhammasamudāyā ye te dukkhasaccaanidassanaappaṭighaacetasikānupādāsadisā satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:57_3: abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato asaṅgāhakā eva na honti,
tika-abh03t0:58_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyyā’’ti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:58_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṁ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṁ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo sabbepi catuttiṁsa hontīti attho. Yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:58_6: na niddhārite pucchitabbadhamme. Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitā, na padena sarūpatoti.
tika-abh03t0:58_7: Tattha tadevāti eva-saddena na taṁ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve niyatataṁ aññassa ca aniyatataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:58_8: ‘‘Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita’’nti ettha hi ‘‘niyamato’’ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti.
tika-abh03t0:58_9: Atha vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṁpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvena evaṁ asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvaniyamanattho eva-saddo,
tika-abh03t0:58_11: Pucchāya uddhaṭañhi aññasahitaṁ asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:59_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṁ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:59_1: Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:59_3: Ettha ca paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:59_5: Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:60_1: Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ asaṅgāhakaṁ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:60_2: Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:60_3: ‘‘Rūpañca dhammāyatana’’ntiādinā yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ taṁ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:60_4: asaṅgahitena tena asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṁ sabbaṁ teva dhamme udāneti.
tika-abh03t0:60_6: Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:60_10: Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati,
tika-abh03t0:60_11: so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca nissayabhāvato ‘‘visayo’’ti vutto,
tika-abh03t0:63_1: Sampayogavippayogapade yaṁ labbhati, yañca na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:63_2: taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitanti idaṁ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:63_4: Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṁ dhammāyatanādipadaṁ na labbhati, taṁ pucchāyapi na gahitaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:63_5: Sampayogapadaṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu alabbhamānampi ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi…pe… sampayutto’’ti evaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:63_9: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṁ nivārentena sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṁ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:63_10: Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṁ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṁ visabhāgatā ca,
tika-abh03t0:63_11: na ca rūpekadesassa nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:63_12: yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṁ nibbānena ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā.
tika-abh03t0:64_0: Sattasuviññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t0:64_2: avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake dhamme dīpenti,
tika-abh03t0:64_3: evaṁ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:64_4: Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti, te dhammeti vuttaṁ hoti, na sampayutteti.
tika-abh03t0:64_5: Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_6: yāni ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṁ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_8: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:64_9: Na hi anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṁsampayuttatadubhayasamudāyānaṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:65_0: Yadi evaṁ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese ‘‘kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:65_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā’’ti na vattabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:65_7: Kusalā pana dhammā akusalābyākatehi vibhattā, te ca kusalehi,
tika-abh03t0:65_9: tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane kusalehi itaresaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:65_10: itarehi ca kusalānaṁ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti tesaṁ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā. Esa nayo sabbesu evarūpesu.
tika-abh03t0:66_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṁ ‘‘soḷasā’’ti vattabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:66_2: Sabbattha ca kālasantānabhedarahitārahitabahudhammasamodhānānaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūnaṁ ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi yathāyogaṁ sampayogaṁ vippayogañca labhanti.
tika-abh03t0:66_3: Atthi hi tesaṁ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā visabhāgatā cāti.
tika-abh03t0:66_4: Tena tattha tattha ‘‘ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutta’’nti ca,
tika-abh03t0:66_5: ‘‘ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta’’nti ca vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:66_6: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t0:66_7: tasmā tesaṁ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa vibhāgaṁ karonti,
tika-abh03t0:66_10: ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā’’ti ca evamādi na vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:66_11: khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi pana viññāṇaṁ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā’’ti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:66_12: evamevaṁ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṁ sukhindriyādīnaṁ ‘‘sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā’’tiādīsu yathāyogaṁ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:67_1: Yathā taṁsampayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya ‘‘samudayasaccaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta’’nti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:67_2: evaṁ taṁvippayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya ‘‘tīhi khandhehi vippayutta’’nti kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh03t0:67_4: Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṁ sukhadukkhadomanassindriyehi manoviññāṇadhātuto aññaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayuttanti yuttaṁ vattuṁ vibhāgeneva visabhāgatāya saṅgahitattā,
tika-abh03t0:67_7: Yañhi anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ na hoti saṅkhataṁ uddharitabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:67_9: tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t0:67_13: vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti hoti .
tika-abh03t0:67_14: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṁ sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti.
tika-abh03t0:67_15: Tassā ca gahitattā sampayogova labbhati, na vippayogo,
tika-abh03t0:67_16: tasmā samudayasaccaṁ vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttattena vuttaṁ, na vippayuttattenāti. Esa nayo maggasaccādīsupīti.
tika-abh03t0:68_0: 262.‘‘Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā’’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā,
tika-abh03t0:68_1: te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti adhippetāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:68_2: Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti te na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:68_3: Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ tehi vippayuttānañca soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto.
tika-abh03t0:68_4: Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti ‘‘ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā’’ti sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:68_5: So hi samudāyo vicāraṁ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_6: Na hi tadekadesassa vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_7: Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṁ iddhipādānaṁ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa na hoti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:68_8: Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_9: evamidhāpi vicārena asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā na na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:68_10: Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṁ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṁ viya sampayuttatā na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:68_11: Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_12: keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto, nāpi añño koci dhammo atthi,
tika-abh03t0:68_13: yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti ‘‘dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā sampayuttāti natthī’’ti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:68_15: Na panevaṁ yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā,
tika-abh03t0:68_16: taṁ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:68_18: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:71_1: Sampayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo tehi sampayuttābhāvato na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:71_3: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_4: Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi vippayuttānaṁ tato aññadhammānaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi.
tika-abh03t0:71_5: Nanu ca te eva cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh03t0:71_7: Na hi te eva dhammā cattāro khandhā, atha kho te ca tato aññe ca,
tika-abh03t0:71_9: Na ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṁ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_11: Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu adhippetesu tesaṁ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ na dissati.
tika-abh03t0:72_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṁ na yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:72_4: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_6: Tattha aññena asammissanti asampayuttena asammissanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:72_8: Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva gahitānīti dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_10: ‘‘Atha phassasattakaṁ cittaṁ saha yuttapadehi sattā’’ti purāṇapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:72_12: tike tayo satta mahantare cā’’ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t0:73_0: 309.Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasenāti idaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehi vippayuttā tena saddhiṁ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:73_2: vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti savitakkapadaṁ savicārapadañca dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:76_1: Vippayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādīhi vippayuttenasampayuttameva yathāniddhāritaṁ natthīti ‘‘rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_2: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā’’ti avatvā ‘‘rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_3: te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe… sampayuttāti natthī’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:76_4: Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṁ kenaci khandhādinā sampayogābhāvato yathāniddhāritaṁ vippayuttenasampayuttameva natthi,
tika-abh03t0:76_5: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:79_4: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yaṁ idha sampayuttaṁ vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:79_5: taṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā sampayuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:79_6: puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ .
tika-abh03t0:79_7: Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā ‘‘sampayuttena sampayutta’’nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t0:79_8: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:79_9: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi.
tika-abh03t0:79_11: Sabbārūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehīti vattamānānameva sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṁ anapanetvā avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi arūpabhavādīhīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:79_12: Ayaṁ panettha saṅkhepo – ye sampayogaṁ na labhanti rūpakkhandhādayo, te sabbe na gahitā,
tika-abh03t0:82_1: Vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese aggahitesu dhammāyatanādidhammā anārammaṇamissakasabbacittuppādagatadhammabhāvato tehi vippayuttassa abhāvā na gahitā,
tika-abh03t0:82_2: dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṁ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t0:85_1: Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi viññāṇadhātūhī’’ti etesaṁ padānaṁ ‘‘sampayuttā nāmā’’ti etena saha sambandho.
tika-abh03t0:85_2: ‘‘Kehicī’’ti etassa panatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇha’’nti etena ‘‘te cā’’ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme visesetvā tesaṁ eva visesitānaṁ attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāmā’’ti.
tika-abh03t0:88_1: Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha ‘‘teyeva uddhaṭā’’ti.
tika-abh03t0:91_1: Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:91_2: te pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘rūpañca dhammāyatana’’ntiādiuddānagāthāya dassitā bāvīsa dhammā ‘‘rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā’’ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_3: Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti,
tika-abh03t0:91_4: te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā ‘‘arūpabhavena sadisā’’ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_5: Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha vissajjanaṁ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh03t0:91_6: Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā, tesu vattabbameva natthi.
tika-abh03t0:91_9: Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṁ asampayogehi vomissatāya sampayogo natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:92_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:92_1: na tesaṁ vippayogo natthīti ‘‘vippayogo ca natthī’’ti na vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:92_2: na vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṁ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:92_3: Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo idha na ruhantīti.
tika-abh03t0:92_4: Evaṁ panettha siyā ‘‘vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh03t0:92_6: Anārammaṇasahitānañhi sabbaviññāṇadhātūnaṁ sabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttānaṁ tadubhayadhammānañca vedanākkhandhādiviññāṇakkhandhādicakkhāyatanādīhi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitānaṁ sampayogavippayogābhāvo aruhaṇe kāraṇaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:92_8: Tattha jātivippayogo ‘‘kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā’’tiādi, bhūmivippayogo ‘‘kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā’’tiādi,
tika-abh03t0:95_2: Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṁ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t0:95_4: Dukkhasaccādidhammāva idha tehi vippayuttānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahasabbhāvā gahitāti.
tika-abh03t0:96_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṁ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:96_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṁ pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:96_3: tena ca saha osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
